scripts.build-client: cd client && npm install && set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run update-ip && npm run build-if-needed && cd server && node server
scripts.start-https: set USE_HTTPS=true&& npm run update-ip && npm run build-if-needed && cd server && node server
scripts.server: npm run update-ip && cd server && nodemon server
scripts.server-https: set USE_HTTPS=true&& npm run update-ip && cd server && nodemon server
scripts.dev: npm run update-ip && concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.dev-https: set USE_HTTPS=true&& npm run update-ip && concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && CI=false npm run build
